text: 4.24: Mk 6.55Kamatɨhi nuŋambirɨm pɨrɨvɨsa Siriandu sɨhanaŋga ambavarata mɨtumu. Kamataharɨm krunavundi kru sɨhanaŋga muhɨmɨmuhɨm kandi nurɨŋ pɨsiŋgarahi kañɨnda aru kavumu haŋɨnɨŋ, sundɨ ñamba naŋga haŋɨnɨŋ, kru kandi andɨhi mɨŋgata yɨvuta nanaŋgarahu kuma tanda tɨkatɨkatɨndi haŋɨnɨŋ, naŋga punzɨ kɨmuhɨmu haŋɨnɨŋ Jisas kɨyɨmiyɨ tɨmbuta payɨmu. Kamatɨhu sundɨ ñamba haŋɨnɨŋ pɨŋguvarambara, kandi naŋga haŋɨnɨŋ mɨŋavindamami.
